title: Narayana Churna
cleaned_text: Narayana Churna Reference: Ashtanga Hridayam Chikitsa Sthana 15/14 – 29 Narayana Churna is an Ayurvedic medicine which is available in the herbal powder form. It is used to treat the various abdominal diseases like bloating, constipation, low appetite, abdominal gas etc. This herbal powder is prepared by the combination of various effective herbs which have the laxative, carminative and stomachic activities. It balances the tridoshas – vata, pitta and kapha. Ingredients Yavani – Trachyspermum ammi – 10 g Hapusha –
